original_text: Then the anger of the Lord was kindled against Moses and he said, “Is there not Aaron, your brother, the Levite? I know that he can speak well. Behold, he is coming out to meet you, and when he sees you, he will be glad in his heart.
korean_text: 여호와께서 모세를 향하여 노하여 이르시되 레위 사람 네 형 아론이 있지 아니하냐 그가 말 잘 하는 것을 내가 아노라 그가 너를 만나러 나오나니 그가 너를 볼 때에 그의 마음에 기쁨이 있을 것이라

sentences.original_text: Then the anger of the Lord was kindled against Moses
“Is there not Aaron, your brother, the Levite?
sentences.korean_translation: 네 형 레위 사람 아론이 없느냐

sentences.original_text: I know that he can speak well.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그가 잘 말하는 것을 안다

sentences.original_text: he is coming out to meet you,
he will be glad in his heart.
